channel.title: [Delta] Npc Drop Fix Please
channel.description:
I need a fix for an error I get when I add too many NPC drops to npcdrops.cfg
[IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/vr5ve1.png[/img]
I can have only up to a certain amount of drops, then when I add one more, it gives me the above error /\ I think the amount of drops it takes for it to get this error is around 225...Thats about how many I have set
Any help?

USE EMULOUS <3

Excuse me rep whore?
Go ride a 3 inch

item.title: [Delta] Npc Drop Fix Please
item.dc:creator: @Ice_Age_Elmo Ice Age Elmo
item.description:
@Ice_Age_Elmo wrote:

Ruzuronni:

No you fucked up something with your NpcDrops.CFG with switching tabs from spaces or spaces from tabs.

Only retards use spaces instead of tabs…

[quote=“raped by who, post:10, topic:295222”]Here’s the only thing that will truly help you in your quest to create a good RSPS.

DONT USE DELTASCAPE.
USE EMULOUS <3[/quote]
Quit posting, get off the forums

TheImpureOne:

No, Deltascape has a npcdrop limit, Trust me I’ve had this problem before very easy fix.

Yeah, got it fixed

item.title: [Delta] Npc Drop Fix Please
item.dc:creator: @TheImpureOne TheImpureOne
item.description:
@TheImpureOne wrote:

Not wanting to bring back up old topics, but I figured I’d add this because it will help some. If you want more then 15 drops then find

public double[][] drops = new double[3851][45] and change the 45 to whatever number. If you divide that number by 3 that is how many drops you can add into an npc drop.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Npc Drop Fix Please
item.dc:creator: @Ice_Age_Elmo Ice Age Elmo
item.description:
@Ice_Age_Elmo wrote:

Ok well when I first opened NPCHandler, I noticed this:

public static int maxNPCDrops = 10000; public static int maxNPCSpawns = 10000; // spawns could be same npc multiple

Also This is lines 505-594:

[code] public static int worldmap2[][] = {
{
/* 01 /3257, 3258, 3260, 3261, 3261, 3262, 3261, 3262, 3257,
3258, 3257, 3258, 3254, 3255, 3254, 3255, 3252, 3252, 3250,
3251, 3250, 3251, 3249, 3250, 3249, 3250, 3242, 3242, 3243,
3243, 3257, 3244, 3245, 3244, 3245, 3247, 3248, 3250, 3251,
3255, 3256, 3255, 3256, 3259, 3260, },
{
/ 01 */3256, 3256, 3256, 3256, 3266, 3266, 3267, 3267, 3270,
3270, 3271, 3271, 3272, 3272, 3273, 3273, 3275, 3276, 3277,
3277, 3278, 3278, 3279, 3279, 3280, 3280, 3285, 3286, 3289,
3290, 3289, 3297, 3297, 3298, 3298, 3298, 3298, 3297, 3297,
3297, 3297, 3298, 3298, 3297, 3297, }, };

public static int randomremoveschaos() {
	return removeschaos[(int) (Math.random() * removeschaos.length)];
}
public int[] combatLevel = new int[3851];
public int[] dropCount = new int[3851];

public double[][] drops = new double[3851][45]; // room for 15 drops per npc

public NPCDrops NpcDrops[] = new NPCDrops[maxNPCDrops];

public NPCList NpcList[] = new NPCList[maxListedNPCs];

public NPC npcs[] = new NPC[maxNPCSpawns];

public int remove = 2; // 1 = removes equipment, 2 = doesn't remove -
// xerozcheez

public int[] respawnTime = new int[3851];

NPCHandler() {
	for (int i = 0; i < maxNPCSpawns; i++) {
		npcs[i] = null;
	}
	for (int i = 0; i < maxListedNPCs; i++) {
		NpcList[i] = null;
	}
	for (int i = 0; i < maxNPCDrops; i++) {
		NpcDrops[i] = null;
	}
	loadNPCList("npc.cfg");
	loadNPCDrops("npcdrops.cfg");
	loadAutoSpawn("autospawn.cfg");
}
public boolean AttackNPC(int NPCID) {
	if (server.npcHandler.npcs[npcs[NPCID].attacknpc] != null) {
		int EnemyX = server.npcHandler.npcs[npcs[NPCID].attacknpc].absX;
		int EnemyY = server.npcHandler.npcs[npcs[NPCID].attacknpc].absY;
		int EnemyHP = server.npcHandler.npcs[npcs[NPCID].attacknpc].HP;
		int hitDiff = 0;

		hitDiff = misc.random(npcs[NPCID].MaxHit);
		if (GoodDistance(EnemyX, EnemyY, npcs[NPCID].absX,
				npcs[NPCID].absY, 1) == true) {
			if (server.npcHandler.npcs[npcs[NPCID].attacknpc].IsDead == true) {
				ResetAttackNPC(NPCID);
				// npcs[NPCID].textUpdate = "Oh yeah I win!";
				// npcs[NPCID].textUpdateRequired = true;
				npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 2103;
				npcs[NPCID].animUpdateRequired = true;
				npcs[NPCID].updateRequired = true;
			} else {
				if ((EnemyHP - hitDiff) < 0) {
					hitDiff = EnemyHP;
				}
				if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 9)
					npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 386;
				if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 3200)
					npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 0x326; // drags: chaos ele
				// emote ( YESSS )
				if ((npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1605)
						|| (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1472)) {
					npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 386; // drags: abberant
					// spector death ( YAY )
				}
				npcs[NPCID].animUpdateRequired = true;
				npcs[NPCID].updateRequired = true;
				server.npcHandler.npcs[npcs[NPCID].attacknpc].hitDiff = hitDiff;
				server.npcHandler.npcs[npcs[NPCID].attacknpc].attacknpc = NPCID;
				server.npcHandler.npcs[npcs[NPCID].attacknpc].updateRequired = true;
				server.npcHandler.npcs[npcs[NPCID].attacknpc].hitUpdateRequired = true;
				npcs[NPCID].actionTimer = 7;
				return true;
			}
		}
	}
	return false;
}[/code][br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 15, 2009, 09:15:38 am[/size][hr]Thanks Final Dawn and ziplock. All I had to do was make sure the amount of drops for one npc wasn't over 15

Rep++ for both of you!

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Npc Drop Fix Please
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“Ice Age Elmo, post:1, topic:295222”]I need a fix for an error I get when I add too many NPC drops to npcdrops.cfg

I can have only up to a certain amount of drops, then when I add one more, it gives me the above error /
I think the amount of drops it takes for it to get this error is around 225…Thats about how many I have set

Any help?[/quote]

Make the array that holds your drops handle more memory, because your’s is set to 45 so just set it higher.

Read full topic
